GSD.product_version: versions from v5.8 to before v5.10.150
GSD.description:
ACPI: APEI: do not add task_work to kernel thread to avoid memory leak

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.150 by commit 110146ce8f84f8f0ef6f09d36e7c5936d5e2f0cf, it was introduced in version v5.8 by commit 7f17b4a121d0d50eca22cb1edebf0a157f3e43bf. For more details please see the references link.
